authshield.title: §c§lLogin Required
authshield.subtitle: §eUse /login <password> to play
authshield.login.title: §c§lLogin Required
authshield.login.subtitle: §eUse /login <password> to play
authshield.login.timeout: §cYou have been kicked for not logging in within 60 seconds
authshield.login.too_many_attempts: §cToo many login attempts. Please try again in %s minutes
authshield.command.needlogin: §cYou must be logged in to execute this command
authshield.register.exists: §cYou are already registered. Please log in
authshield.register.nomatch: §cPasswords do not match. Please try again
authshield.register.success: §aRegistration successful. You can now log in
authshield.register.password.needsymbol: §cPassword must contain at least one special character
authshield.register.password.needupper: §cPassword must contain at least one uppercase letter
authshield.register.password.neednumber: §cPassword must contain at least one number
authshield.drop.needlogin: §cYou must be logged in to drop items
